## Significance

alternative analytic framework (e.g. evaluation of a posterior in a Bayesian analysis, etc.)
Level of significance for primary hypotheses, including a description and rationale for any
multiple comparisons adjustment or Type I error control procedures
Description of any decision-making rules based on confidence intervals, credible intervals,
